page.title: 19Law and Order in Orwell
page.content: There is now no police house in Milnathort or anywhere in our block.{Police patrols}regularly and frequently visit the village and travel the rural roads. When doing night patrols the two-man crew will leave their car in the middle of Milnathort and patrol on foot. Their personal radios keep them in touch with{Kinross Police Station,}and they can use their car's radio to relay messages to Perth, or even Dundee. The road patrols have often been called to accidents on the A911 Mil- nathort to Leslie(Fife) road, many of these having been at Channel Bends, 4km from Milnathort. The local police are pleased to be involved with the community. This has helped to maintain the low crime rate in this part of{Tayside.}Co-operation between police and public is very good
